Ernest 0040! 🧨

Ernest, you've been entitle a mission

The individual in the picture above is known to be a dangerous secret agent from the UK and as been causing much disturbance lately. We need to take him down, but first, you will have to find as much as possible about this agent. If you get the right answers to all of the questions bellow, you will gain access to some sensitive data that will help you fulfill your mission. Agent 0040, your country is counting on you.

Quiz

Please answer all the questions!

Question 1

How many actors in total have portrayed Bond in film?

This number is considered lucky.

Question 2

Which one of these actors never portrayed Bond in a movie?

This is the name of a well known canadian ski destination.

Question 3

Roger Moore appeared as Bond in how many films?

It may come after double zero.

Question 4

In which movie did James Bond say: "Well, I’m afraid you’ve caught me with more than my hands up."

It might be found on rings.

Question 5

Who wrote and interpreted the theme song of the Bond movie "Live And Let Die"?

The Beatles

Your result 🏆

Joyeux anniversaire Ernest!! 🍾 🥳

Pour tes 40 ans sous le thème de James Bond, je voulais faire quelque chose de spécial. J'ai alors créé ce petit jeux pour souligner ton anniversaire et s'amuser un peu! Aussi, tu trouveras plus bas quelques témoignages de gens qui t'aime. 😉

Témoignages 🌈 🧡

⭐ Odille Potvin-Proulx
